review: It does almost everything I want: cast videos to TV from youtube, netflix, a growing list of other streaming websites, and for everything else, I can play on my laptop and cast the tab (full screen) to the TV.For all the supported apps/streaming sites, I can browse other videos while watching the current one. It has made watching TV easy and almost seamless. Best of all, it doesn't drain the battery when casting a supported service.
author: S. Li

review: This device is recommended for old models of LED's or LCD's as the new models have built in option to cast your programs through you phone or PC
author: Faheem

review: Good start and displays well.  Certainly hope that more media types and sites will have the "click thro" display feature.
author: Amazon Customer

review: After getting rid of cable, I wanted some other options and an easy way to display those on my TV. I now own two Chromecasts and have not had any trouble. I use them for Netflix and Hulu and they are great.
author: Bearcat fan0609

review: Was exactly what I expected.  Worked flawlessly from multiple devices.  Now I do not need external speakers to listen to Pandora.  I just listen through my TV.
author: Lady Di

review: Works reasonably well but since it streams from another device, it is not as convenient. It would be better if it worked like a roku.
author: Pradeep K. Kedia "Pinch Hitter"

review: Extremely easy to set up. Easy to stream content. Works great with limited apps it's advertised to support.My only complaint is that the apps that support it is limited. I wish chrome for android allowed me to stream video, but it only works for chrome on pc.Regardless of it's limitations, it's a pretty awesome little product for such a cheap price.
author: Corey Ferguson

review: I love the Google Chromecast!!!!! Inexpensive and works great!! Going to purchase another one for my bedroom TV!!! Great item!!
author: lana

review: I've used this very nice Chromecast player with my Android Samsung Tablet and it worked right away out of the box. II'll i had to do was plug it in, Download the app from Google Play, Setup the app and device in a few easy steps, set my TV to HDMI 2 and it broad cast in georgeous HDMI with fantastic audio. I was not sure if it would work this well but WOW...What and inexpensive and easy to use product to enjoy your Tablet and TV even more.
author: Jeffrey Burger

review: Now I used mine to watch downloaded movies and tv shows through Plex, which I have to pay for (but it's cheap) and I'm really happy with it. If you have a smart TV don't buy this you likely have access to all of the apps already. The pandora and YouTube apps are nice. I like it.
author: K. Demick "Ken the Majestic"
